farmLocation.description: The location of the user's farm.

totalArea.description: The total area of the user's farm in hectares.

FarmRecord.title: Farm Record
FarmRecord.description: A record of a farm's activities.

cropType.description: The type of crop (e.g., rice, corn, banana, vegetables).

plantingDate.description: The date the crop was planted.

area.description: The area of the farm in hectares.

expenses.description: The total expenses for the crop in Philippine pesos.

inputsUsed.description: The types and amounts of inputs used (fertilizer, pesticides, etc.).

harvestQuantity.description: The quantity of the harvest in sacks or kilograms.

harvestDate.description: The date the crop was harvested.

marketPrice.description: The market price per unit of harvest.

farmerId.description: The ID of the farmer who owns this record.

/farmRecords/{farmRecordId}.description: Stores individual farm records for all users.
